# Technical support

# description

this page allow users to add support tickets and follow old tickets

  • Technical support Page (opens new window)

# Saved ticket

  • this page show old support tickets and tickets status

  • click OPEN A NEW TICKET button to add new support

  • click Ticket title to follow up

# Add new ticket

  • add title and problem message the click OPEN A NEW TICKET to open support ticket

  • or click BACK to cancel adding ticket

# Follow up

  • click Ticket title to follow up old ticket

  • user can see admin replies and add replay

  • or click BACK to go back
